name: Us n' Them
overview: A 1996 game by James Gwinnett and Steve Wong of 2 Bit Productions released as Surveyware, where you were asked to fill out an attached survey and return it to them for full rights. It is an Archon style game for two, where when two pieces attack each other on the board it adjourns to a battle field and the 2 pieces fight it out, often in a dueling shooter style match up.
